name: Guardian's Oath (itch)
description:
Guardian's Oath is a 2D RPG that has unique fighting mechanics in physics world.

  • Stats (Agility, Strength, Vitality...)
  • Bosses
  • Quest & Main Quests
  • Economics
  • Detailed Fight Mechanics
  • 200+ Upgradable Items
  • 3 Different Classes (Warrior, Archer, Magician)
  • Musics unique for the game
  • Styles
  • 12 Main, 10 Normal Skills
